name: HexIsles
description:
HexIsles

This is my Submission to Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1.

Feedback in the comments would be very appreciated!

CONTROLS:

Zoom: Scroll wheel / Arrow keys
Move Camera: Right Mouse + Drag
Select/Deselect : Left Mouse
Menu: Escape / Space

Cheat Code: Press Alt + Q to unlock all levels

CREDITS:

Programming & Design: Samuel Birth (that's me)
Music: F. Birth
LowPoly Water: Free asset from Ebru Dogan
Game Engine: Unity 3D (2019.4.20f1)Font: Josefin Sans

Made in 7 days for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 to the theme "Stronger Together" in Unity3D (Used hex grid system and camera movement made before)
